title: To the Nightingale - poem as a whole

content.prompt: The poem as a whole is best described as

choices.label: a factual account of a writer’s observations of the natural world
a helpful piece of practical advice to poets about how to begin writing
a fanciful expression of a poet’s frustration with the creative process
an allegorical story about the origins of the nightingale

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
